greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Basis of degenerate cases of sequences identical to its p-th differences. Complement to A140344 which is based on natural Catalan's triangle. Triangle without first term (probable 1) on line.
formula: First four rows of triangle from second row: 1, 1; 1, 2, 2; see A099087, 1, 3, 5, 5; 1, 3, 6, 9, 9; see A057083 which can be preceded with 3 leading 0's, are, as said, from natural Catalan's triangle A009766. Origin of a(n) explained later.
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Jun 13 2008
